episode_summary: This episode covers a range of fascinating topics including the use of 'wetter water' by firefighters, the concept of a plant internet made of fungus, historical school riots over beer rations, and the discovery of the clitoris by a 16th-century anatomist.

facts.fact: Firefighters use wetter water than we do.
Plants have their own internet, and it's made of fungus.
In 1710, the boys of Winchester College rioted over insufficient beer rations.
The first man to discover the clitoris was Colombo.
